channel.title: Windows Vienna
channel.description:
Windows Vienna is supposed to be out officially in 2009. Do you think it will be a failure like windows vista, or a revolution in computers.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_7

item.title: Windows Vienna
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

You’re still wasting memory and cpu usage. Vista takes up about 500-700mb of memory?

[quote author=Unhandled link=topic=307776.msg2462114#msg2462114 date=1222528527]

If Linux didn’t suck, that’d stand true!

Just because you’re too retarded to figure it out?
[/quote]No, no, too lazy.

If Linux didn’t suck, that’d stand true!

Just because you’re too retarded to figure it out?

For some people Linux isn’t the OS to use. For instance, if you play a lot of games you’ll want windows.
[/quote]If you don’t want to be hassled to death by bullshit, you’ll pick Windows/Mac.

That’s weird, that’s the reason I stay away from Windows and Mac :p[/quote]Lmao

Read full topic

Actually i think Windows 7 will be better as they actually focus on not having the system require 9999999999999999999999 cpu and memory. Doesn’t change the fact linux > * though
[/quote]

Must be opposite day cuz linux sucks.[/quote]

no, not really, you’re just an idiot

item.title: Windows Vienna
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Windows 7 Runs on the New OS Kernel. Minwin. This kernel takes up about 48mb of memory on first boot.

Does not sound like vista to me.

[quote=“army_life, post:18, topic:233381”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=307776.msg2462733#msg2462733 date=1222557306]

May/May not make a comeback for windows, i’m not sure

Windows never went anywhere, they don’t need to “comeback”.
[/quote]

Yet they have made billions of dollars making ‘shit’ OS?[/quote]
Thats not what i’m saying, i’m saying to dragonfire that windows never suffered much because of vista - he is saying it as if microsoft went down because of vista.

item.title: Windows Vienna
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Linux can be a pain in the ass to understand and to set up. For those who don’t even understand how to use windows fast and clean, it’s a no go. Some people don’t trust Linux, because it’s not well known to average computer users and because they think that it’s not maintained by real company’s.

Most people think that windows is the only OS, my parents have never heard of Linux or Mac before.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows Vienna
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Altough I do think it looks good, and so did Vista, it just sucks. Compare it to a car. If you can choose between a Ferrari with a Fiat Panda engine or a Porsche with a Ferrari engine, what would you pick? Those who go for performance will pick the Porsche, those who go for slow but good looking will pick the Ferrari. I’d pick the Porsche.

Read full topic
